concept.title: Case 7: Basic Prepaid for multiple services

section.title: Overview
section.p: Bob has an iPhone with Prepaid main account balance for multiple services, such as SMS, MMS, and data. The amount of Prepaid resources consumed is based on a defined rate. When the entire value of the account main balance is exhausted, the data, SMS, or MMS call services are denied.

ul.li: A Prepaid main account is associated with the iPhone for SMS, MMS, and data services.

li.p: The account balance can be used either in data or SMS service at a defined rate.

For example, SMS service is charged at 0.02 United States dollar per SMS, MMS service is charged at 0.04 United States dollar per SMS, and data is charged 0.125 United States dollars per 25 MB of data consumed.

ul.li: Execute an SMS, MMS, or data call from the device and verify the charging is applied at the defined rate.
Verify that SMS, MMS, or data calls are rejected once the account balance is exhausted.

section.title: Provisioning

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.

section.p:
Following entities are required for this use case. Entities for case 7
Entity Task
Charging Service Create a charging service.
Lifecycles Create a subscription, account, and device lifecycles.
Rates Create different rates to be applied for data, SMS, MMS services.
Bundle Create a bundle and associate it with the subscription lifecycle.
Account Create an account and associate with an account lifecycle.
Device Create a device and associate with a bundle and device lifecycle.

ol.li:
Create the device lifecycle with following states:
Preactive (Initial flag -> True)
Active
Active Warned
Expired (Flag Barring -> True)
Disconnected (Flag Final and Barring ->True)
Configure the triggering events as per the requirements.
Provision the iPhone in the Active state.

Define three rates - RateSMS, RateMMS, and RateData.
RateSMS:
RateMMS is defined as 0.04 United States dollar per MMS.
RateData is defined as 0.125 United States dollar per 25 MB of data consumed.

Create CS_PayasyouGo charging service with the following configuration:
Parameter Value
Name CS_PayasyouGo
Priority 23
Category DefaultCategory
Tariff formula:

Create a subscription lifecycle with the following states that never expire and always remain active:
Preactive
Active (Initial flag = True)
Create a bundle for the charging service and subscription lifecycle.
Create a subscription for the data bundle and the iPhone must have access to this subscription.
The main account must have sufficient balance to complete a call.
